Researcher Pio:
What?
I have an idea.The energy of the spirit world Wind gets in through the Spatial Rift.
It mixes with the Wind, then the Spirits absorb and lose her mind...
The wind is Your element. Suddenly You can cope with distraught Spirits? Suddenly between you and them there is a connection?
You need to check. I hope You will not refuse. Perhaps this is my last request...
